scripts.dev: NODE_ENV=development SESSION_SECRET=dev-secret nodemon --exec ts-node --project tsconfig.server.json src/index.ts
scripts.build: npm install typescript @types/express @types/express-session @types/cors @types/body-parser --save-dev && npx prisma generate --schema=./prisma/schema.preview.prisma && npx prisma generate --schema=./prisma/schema.production.prisma && tsc -p tsconfig.server.json && cp -r generated dist/
scripts.prepare: npm install typescript @types/express @types/express-session @types/cors @types/body-parser --no-save && npx prisma generate --schema=./prisma/schema.preview.prisma
